Description
Feel like C. Viper from Street Fighter IV with this alternate pair of boots! Put these stylish pair of boots on and become Miss Perfect! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour C. Viper de Street Fighter IV avec ces bottes alternatives ! Mettez-les et laissez votre style s'exprimer ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Fühle dich mit diesen alternativen Stiefeln wie C. Viper aus Street Fighter IV! Mit diesen schwarzen Schmuckstücken bist du perfekt gekleidet! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Diventa C. Viper di Street Fighter IV con questo paio alternativo di stivali! Mettiti questi stilosi stivali e diventa Miss Perfezione! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte este par de botas alternativas y siéntete como C. Viper de Street Fighter IV! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 ヴァイパーになりきることができるアレンジ ver.のブーツ スタイリッシュなブーツを履いて、あなたも今日からミズ・パーフェクト！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 바이퍼가 되는 어렌지 ver. 부츠. 스타일리시한 부츠로 당신도 오늘부터 미즈 퍼팩트! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like C. Viper from Street Fighter IV with this alternate pair of boots! Put these stylish pair of boots on and become Miss Perfect! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
